heading: Balazan Thrash Spiritborn Endgame Build Guide
content: Welcome to the Balazan Thrash Spiritborn Endgame Guide! This build focuses on scaling and dealing damage with , more specifically its paired with . While there are multiple possible variations including , this build uses as its catalyst. Compared to the others, this one strikes a great middle ground of consistency in cooldown resets and damage output because it relies on , so it works in all situations and not only when bosses hit 80% HP. In addition, it has a relatively high skill ceiling due to the timing of various procs and cooldowns such as , and thanks to performs much better against bosses with additional adds compared to single target encounters.
